name: Nrg
storyline:
See everything, everywhere, all at once! The goal is to dominate the opposition through either acquisition or destruction, so observation should be your prioritization! With a view of the entire stage the whole time, you can choose to close the gap on your opponents or keep your distance as you collect energy.

Taunting and doing post-fight finishing moves is always an awesome part of any game... But it never really matters, you know? Well it does now! Low on energy? Taunt to bring it up! Just take down another player? Do a finishing move on them for a huge reward! Careful though, because while doing either you'll be vulnerable to attacks, so choose wisely.

What's the point of having your very own little robot dude if you can't make him look exactly how you want? From hats to shoes and everything in-between, we want to give you the freedom to make your character yours. We'll be consistently updating the store with more items and animations for you to pick from!
summary: Take platforming to the next dimension! Parkour your way around the stage while you collect energy and shoot anyone who gets in your way. Manage your energy level wisely to get the win, then use your earnings to customize your character until your heart's content!
